BBEX3.M.MXN.USD.CA.AA.A01: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Mexico / USD 1 = MXN ... (buying)

General: Currency conversion with effect from 1 January 1993 at the rate of 1,000 Mexican peso (MXP) = 1 Mexican new peso (MXN). On 1 January 1996, the currency name was changed from Mexican new peso (MXN) to Mexican peso (MXN).
Source: Since end of May 2003: Banco de México, Mexico City 1993 - April 2003: Dresdner Bank Lateinamerika AG, Hamburg (formerly: Deutsch-Südamerikanische Bank AG).
